author: jfarrell
msg: Thrift-1322: OCaml lib fail to compile: Thrift.ml line 305, int vs int32 mismatch
Updates the ocaml lib INTERNAL and PROTOCOL error enums to use the correct numeric values

author: stsp
msg: On the fs-successor-ids branch, write successor-IDs for empty revisions, too.
Not writing successors for empty revisions violates a constraint of the
design: Every revision needs to be recorded in db/successors/revs/* files
so that offsets can be computed correctly.
(commit_body): Update successor map even if the successor IDs hash is empty.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Reinitialize Python thread support after a library reload or a fork.
